casebody.data:
IRVING TRUST COMPANY, as Trustee in Bankruptcy of Hyman ABESBAUM, Bankrupt, Plaintiff, v. MERCANTILE BANK & TRUST COMPANY, Defendant. No. 347. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 11, 1936. Benjamin Siegel, of New York City (Edward 1. Kaplan and Benjamin Brownstein, both of New York City, of counsel), for plaintiff. David Asch, of New York City (Martin Conboy and William J. Butler, both of New York City, of counsel), for defendant.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
